channel.title: Add Dragon Claws? Wrong Section Maybe? :/
channel.description: i don't know if this goes in help or the models section, but i have no idea how to use gfx and i have a little notebook so i cant even see everything on alot of programs, so i cant use them. am i allowed to ask for the drag claws stuff or is that against the rules? :| i don't know, sorry. this is a 317 btw.
